name: What The Bleep Button: WTB
description:
*** FREE for a very limited amount of time. Only the next certain amount of downloads will be given at no cost :) ***

See what people are saying about WTB Button!:

"Simple and AWESOME. Wow I finally find an awesome Bleep app the best one so far and for free!!!" - Ear Ringing

"Awesome! This is pretty cool!! and funny too" - Christine46483

"Thanks for 'Shut yo mouth'! I needed that! My parents will accidently swear like if they make a wrong move in a card game my mom would say to my dad "Stop swearing damn'it!!" Cause he might accidently swear. Now I can use that on them! And pardon my language. ;)" - Erniepav

* * * * *

Dirty Mouth? Clean it with WTB Button!

WTB Button is the easiest way to bleep/censor out all the nastiness in life. Features include:

*Quick start up time. No waiting to load. Great for quick triggers.

*Only the highest quality and fidelity "BLEEEP" available; used on network television!

*Make your "bleeps" last as long (or as short) as you hold down the button. Whether you feel the urge for quick bursts or long sprays of @#$%#! words, WTB button will cover you.

*Quickest responsive bleeps on the market!

*7 sounds total added last minute!
.Bleep!
.Police Siren
.Glass Shattering
.Fog Horn
."Shut Yo Mouth!"
.Crazy Horn
.Car Beep

Life can get nasty. Bleep it out with the appropriate sounds!

Version Log
-1.0: Initial Release; Added extra sounds last minute!
